[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Multi-feature] [FA/Coin transition] Features like CoinToFungibleAssetMigration, PrimaryAPTFungibleStoreAtUserAddress, NewAccountsDefaultToFaStore, OperationsDefaultToFaAptStore manage the Coin-to-FungibleAsset migration. Can incorrect sequencing or conflicts cause loss of funds during migration? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Multi-feature] [Aggregator versions] AggregatorV2Api, AggregatorV2DelayedFields, AggregatorV2IsAtLeastApi introduce aggregator functionality. Can enabling these without proper initialization cause state corruption in concurrent transactions? (High)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Multi-feature] [Resource group variants] ResourceGroups, SaferResourceGroups, ResourceGroupsSplitInVmChangeSet modify resource storage. Can enabling conflicting resource group features cause resource duplication or inaccessibility? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Multi-feature] [Signature checker versions] SignatureCheckerV2 and SignatureCheckerV2ScriptFix are separate features. Can enabling only one but not the other create signature verification bypass opportunities? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Multi-feature] [Multisig enhancement] MultisigAccounts, MultisigV2Enhancement, and AbortIfMultisigPayloadMismatch affect multisig security. Can feature activation order allow unauthorized multisig operations? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Multi-feature] [Consensus coordination] JwkConsensus and JwkConsensusPerKeyMode change JWT key consensus. Can switching between these modes mid-epoch cause validator disagreement on valid keys? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Multi-feature] [Gas payer features] GasPayerEnabled, FeePayerAccountOptional, and SponsoredAutomaticAccountCreation enable fee payment variants. Can conflicting settings allow transaction fee manipulation or sponsor impersonation? (High)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Multi-feature] [Module event migration] ModuleEvent and ModuleEventMigration handle event system changes. Can improper migration sequence cause event loss or double-emission? (High)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: CodeDependencyCheck] [Dependency bypass] If CodeDependencyCheck is disabled through governance, can malicious modules bypass dependency verification and deploy with circular dependencies or reference non-existent modules? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: TreatFriendAsPrivate] [Visibility violation] Disabling TreatFriendAsPrivate could expose internal module functions. Can this be exploited to call privileged functions that should be private? (High)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: ChargeInvariantViolation] [Gas bypass] If ChargeInvariantViolation is disabled, can transactions that violate Move invariants execute without proper gas charging, enabling DoS attacks? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: StorageDeletionRefund] [Economic exploit] Can malicious actors exploit StorageDeletionRefund by repeatedly storing and deleting data to extract more refunds than paid, draining validator rewards? (High)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: SingleSenderAuthenticator] [Auth bypass] Does SingleSenderAuthenticator enforce proper signature validation, or can it be exploited to authorize transactions with weaker authentication? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: PartialGovernanceVoting] [Voting manipulation] Can PartialGovernanceVoting be exploited to split voting power in ways that manipulate governance outcomes or enable double-voting? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: ObjectCodeDeployment] [Code injection] Does ObjectCodeDeployment enable deployment of code into existing objects? Could this allow code injection into trusted system objects? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: LimitMaxIdentifierLength] [DOS through long identifiers] If LimitMaxIdentifierLength is disabled, can extremely long module or function names cause parsing failures, memory exhaustion, or database storage issues? (High)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: RejectUnstableBytecode] [Bytecode security] If RejectUnstableBytecode or RejectUnstableBytecodeForScript are disabled, can unfinished bytecode features be exploited before proper security review? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: DisallowUserNative] [Native function abuse] If DisallowUserNative is disabled, can user-deployed modules declare native functions to bypass Move VM safety and directly access system resources? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: RefundableBytes] [Storage economics] Can RefundableBytes be exploited to manipulate storage pricing, getting refunds for storage that was never actually released? (Medium)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: MaxObjectNestingCheck] [Stack overflow] If MaxObjectNestingCheck is disabled, can deeply nested objects cause stack overflow in Move VM during object traversal or serialization? (High)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: OperatorBeneficiaryChange] [Staking theft] Can OperatorBeneficiaryChange be exploited to redirect staking rewards to attacker-controlled addresses without proper authorization? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: WebAuthnSignature] [Crypto implementation] Does WebAuthnSignature properly validate WebAuthn assertions, or could malformed signatures bypass authentication? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: ConcurrentFungibleAssets] [Race conditions] Can ConcurrentFungibleAssets introduce race conditions in fungible asset transfers that allow double-spending through parallel transaction execution? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: ConcurrentTokenV2] [NFT duplication] Can ConcurrentTokenV2's parallel execution create race conditions that allow NFT duplication or transfer to multiple owners? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/feature_flags.rs] [Feature: DelegationPoolAllowlisting] [Censorship] Can DelegationPoolAllowlisting be misused to censor specific delegators, preventing them from participating in staking? (High)
